items.description: Highway terrain tires are commonly used on light trucks and SUVs that typically haul materials or need to conquer highways and some off-road terrains.

Most popular among drivers in PA

content.body:
### Shop 275/45R20 tire Size The 275/45R20 is a tire size you’ll find almost exclusively on crossovers like the Porsche Cayenne, Volkswagen Touareg, Jeep Grand Cherokee, Volvo XC90 and Infiniti QX4. For most crossover drivers, all-season tires make the most sense thanks to their combination of confident handling, comfortable ride, low road noise and dependable traction year-round, even in light wintry conditions. Some of our favorite all-season tires in the 275/45R20 size include the Pirelli Scorpion All Season Plus 3, Firestone Destination LE3, [Yokohama Geolandar X-CV](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/geolandar-x-cv), and Nexen Roadian GTX. Popular vehicles: 2010-2021 Porsche Cayenne
2010-2018 Volkswagen Touareg
2006-2010 Jeep Grand Cherokee
2015-2021 Volvo XC90
2001-2003 Infiniti QX4 Sporty crossovers like the Porsche Cayenne and Volvo XC90 might want a set of 275/45R20 tires that can help them push the envelope a bit more than standard all-season tires would. Ultra-high-performance tires give these drivers the sporty traction and performance they want, so check out the [Continental ExtremeContact DWS06 PLUS](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/extremecontact-dws06-plus), Michelin Pilot Sport PS2, Pirelli Scorpion Zero All Season Plus, or Kumho Ecsta STX KL12 if you want a set of tires that will help your ride take corners, accelerate, and brake quicker. If you live in a part of the country that has tough winters with lots of snow, all-season tires sometimes can’t give you the traction you need. That’s when dedicated winter tires are a good choice, thanks to their specialized tread pattern and a rubber formulation that stays flexible and pliable at subfreezing temperatures. We’d recommend winter tires like the [Bridgestone Blizzak DM-V2](https://simpletire.com/brands/bridgestone-tires/blizzak-dm-v2), Michelin X-Ice Snow, Nokian Hakkapeliitta 10 SUV, and Falken Eurowinter HS01 SUV. Whether you drive a Porsche Cayenne, Volkswagen Touareg, Volvo XC90 or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 275/45R20 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
